decks.notes: This UWx Control deck relies on a combination of counterspells, removal, and disruptive spells like Teferi, Time Raveler and Narset, Parter of Veils to control the game and slow down the opponent's game plan. The deck also utilizes cards like Back to Basics to disrupt mana bases, while leveraging powerful card selection and card advantage with Brainstorm and Ponder. By controlling the board and denying the opponent resources, this deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent, eventually grinding out a win through card advantage and powerful threats like The wandering Emperor and Supreme Verdict.

This Bant Control deck focuses on utilizing a high number of control spells and card draw to control the game's pace and outvalue the opponent. With a mix of counterspells, removal, and card draw engines like Teferi, Time Raveler and Narset, Parter of Veils, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while consistently drawing into threats like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and The Wandering Emperor. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion adds additional value and flexibility to the already versatile deck.

The deck revolves around assembling the Painter's Servant combo with either Grindstone or Phyrexian Dragon Engine to mill the opponent's library in one turn. It aims to generate mana quickly with cards like Simian Spirit Guide and Chrome Mox to power out its combo pieces while disrupting the opponent with cards like Chalice of the Void and Trinisphere. The deck also includes aggressive creatures like Goblin Rabblemaster to pressure the opponent and close out games quickly. The main focus is on efficiently executing the combo to win the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and spells, utilizing the Cascade mechanic to cheat out powerful spells like Crashing Footfalls and Violent Outburst. The deck aims to apply pressure early on, disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Force of Will and Force of Negation. Additionally, the inclusion of Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes provides a versatile and resilient threat that can further complement the aggro strategy. The deck's consistency is enhanced by the mana base and efficient mana acceleration tools like Simian Spirit Guide and Elvish Spirit Guide.

This deck revolves around the powerful combo of using Doomsday to stack our deck with a winning sequence of cards, followed by Thassa's Oracle to win the game on the spot. The deck includes efficient card selection and card advantage tools like Brainstorm, Ponder, and Personal Tutor to set up the combo quickly. It also includes various disruption spells like Force of Will and Thoughtseize to protect the combo or disrupt our opponent's game plan. The deck is designed to be fast and efficient, aiming to win the game as quickly as possible.
